CustomField.formula: If( Not( ISBLANK(Deployment_Date__c)) , (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Deployment_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Deployment_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( datevalue(CreatedDate)- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ), (5 * ( FLOOR( ( today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( today()- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( datevalue(CreatedDate)- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ))
CustomField.label: Deployment Duration
